snippet: The media company reported earnings of $119.9 million, or 51 cents a share, for April through June, compared with $151.5 million, or 62 cents a share, a year earlier.
abstract: Gannett reports second-quarter earnings of $119.9 million, or 51 cents a share, down 21 percent from $151.5 million, or 62 cents a share, in the year-ago quarter; revenue was $1.31 billion, down 2 percent from $1.33 billion.
lead_paragraph: The media company reported earnings of $119.9 million, or 51 cents a share, for April through June, compared with $151.5 million, or 62 cents a share, a year earlier.

headline.seo: Gannett Profit Falls 21% but Exceeds Forecasts
headline.main: Gannett Profit Falls 21% While Slightly Exceeding Forecasts
headline.print_headline: Gannett Profit Falls 21% While Slightly Exceeding Forecasts
